thread.title: I Can Watch This Cowboy On YouTube Deep Fry A Steak All Day
thread.title_full: I Can Watch This Cowboy On YouTube Deep Fry A Steak All Day

author: Brandon Wenerd
title: I Can Watch This Cowboy On YouTube Deep Fry A Steak All Day
text:
Steak purists will say that deep frying steak is blasphemy — The only way to eat it is rare, on the grill or pan-fried in a skillet. What a bunch of baloney. Been a few years since I’ve had me some deep fried steak, cowboy-style, but damn if it isn’t juicy and delicious. 
Cowboy Kent Rollins is a YouTube guy who runs a chuckwagon where he shows off how to cook on an open fire . His deep-fried steak is the stuff a true carnivore’s dreams are made of. Just look at how delicious this looks! Ain’t no salisbury steak, that’s for sure.
